name: Star Battlefront
description:
Game Introduction
Open your cell phone and come with Star Frontier. You will step into a mysterious magnificent world to join the most intense and thrilling star war ever.

You will be the commander of the 6 warplanes of high technology to combat against 10 more enemy planes in the vast universe. Build and command different universe planes with yourbrilliant strategy to fight against the murderous enemies.
Wisdom and courage is in the air!

Commander, the frontier needs you! Your heroic team is waiting for you!

Features
•6 universe warplanes of different remarkable features create more brilliant strategies.
•Powerful upgrading system provides you with the super performance and perfect plane shape.
•Topvisual effectsbring you the mostrealisticcombatexperiencein star war!
•Over 30 different enemies allow you learn and grow quickly to challenge more powerful ones.
•Exquisite battle designed to arouse your military strategy will bring you the most exciting game experience.
•4 super powerful weapons of different powers will help you to reverse the war!
